Spirit's Bulwark

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Shaman, Protector Spirit class feature, call spirit companion power
Benefit: Whenever an attack against your spirit companion causes the spirit to disappear, one ally adjacent to it gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter or until you next use call spirit companion.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 14.
